Interface PersistenceStore

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FilePersistenceStore, ZkPersistenceStore

    public interface PersistenceStore

    • Method Detail

      • persistJob

        boolean persistJob(BaseJob baseJob)
        Persists a job in the state abstraction.
        Parameters:
        baseJob - the jobDefinition to persist
        Returns:
        true if the taskId was saved, false if the taskId couldn't be saved.

      • persistTask

        boolean persistTask(java.lang.String jobName,
                  BaseTask task)
        Saves a Running task info in the state abstraction.
        Parameters:
        jobName - the name of the job to persist.
        task - the running task info of the job
        Returns:
        true if the taskId was saved, false if the taskId couldn't be saved.

      • removeJob

        boolean removeJob(java.lang.String jobName)
        Removes a job in the state abstraction.
        Parameters:
        jobName - the name of the job to remove.
        Returns:
        true if the job was removed, false if the job couldn't be removed.

      • removeTask

        boolean removeTask(java.lang.String taskId)
        Removes a task in the state abstraction.
        Parameters:
        taskId - the taskId to remove.
        Returns:
        true if the job was removed, false if the job couldn't be removed.

      • getJobs

        java.lang.Iterable<BaseJob> getJobs()
        Loads all jobs in the state abstraction.
        Returns:
        An iterable of all jobs' definition, and return an empty iterable if there are no jobs

      • getTasks

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,BaseTask> getTasks()
        Loads all jobs in the state abstraction.
        Returns:
        A map from JobName to its running info, and return an empty map if there are no running tasks

      • getFrameworkID

        Protos.FrameworkID getFrameworkID()
        Load the frameworkId from the underlying store
        Returns:
        return the frameworkId the framework earlier registered and persisted, or null if no frameworkId has ever been persisted.

      • persistFrameworkID

        boolean persistFrameworkID(Protos.FrameworkID frameworkID)
        Persists a FrameworkID in the state abstraction.
        Parameters:
        frameworkID - the FrameworkID to persist
        Returns:
        true if the FrameworkID was saved, false if the FrameworkID couldn't be saved.

      • removeFrameworkID

        boolean removeFrameworkID()
        Removes the FrameworkId in the state abstraction.
        Returns:
        true if the FrameworkId was removed, false if the FrameworkId couldn't be removed.

      • clean

        boolean clean()
        Clean the state abstraction
